title: "An unknown DirectX error has occured and League of Legends cannot start."*
body:
*(here I will write the next part of the error): "Please make sure your video card is running the latest video drivers from the manufacturer."


Okay so this thing appears me when i try to play LoL. SO: I open The LoL launcher , Then i press LAUNCH. Then the next thing that appears on my monitor is the login screen. Evrithyng is good till this point. I login in , but then , after i press play for example, an tutorial , it gives me a full blackscreen for a sec , and the next thing is the error.  I tried the repair button from the "?" but it didn't solve the problem. Anybody please haelp me , i have never played LoL before and now the launcher just fails. Anybody who can help me is invited to do it!!! :D Thanks!!!

replies.body:
As the error suggests, most of the time this issue can be resolved by reinstalling your graphics drivers. There are also a few more factors that could cause this as well. I suggest you follow the steps in [this knowledge base article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) in order to resolve this issue.

Let me know if these steps helped.
It happend to me also, but i cant make it work welp plz
